trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows control that allows the user to select a date and a time and to display the date and time with a specified format.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 控制項，這個控制項允許使用者選取日期和時間，並使用指定的格式來顯示日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control is used to allow the user to select a date and time, and to display that date and time in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制項用來允許使用者選取日期和時間，並顯示該日期與時間中指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control makes it easy to work with dates and times because it handles a lot of the data validation automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制項可讓您輕鬆地使用日期和時間，因為它會自動處理大量的資料驗證。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control only supports Gregorian calendars.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制項僅支援西曆。

trans-unit.source: When used to represent a date, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control appears in two parts: a drop-down list with a date represented in text, and a calendar that appears when you click the down-arrow next to the list.
trans-unit.target: 當用來代表日期，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制項出現在兩個部分： 下拉式清單，以表示文字，並按一下清單旁邊的向下箭號時，會出現日曆日期。

trans-unit.source: The calendar looks like the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control, which can be used for selecting multiple dates.
trans-unit.target: 行事曆看起來像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項，可用來選取多個日期。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control, see [MonthCalendar Control Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/monthcalendar-control-overview-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制，請參閱[MonthCalendar 控制項概觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/monthcalendar-control-overview-windows-forms.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can change the look of the calendar portion of the control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarFont%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarTitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarTitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarTrailingForeColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarMonthBackground%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更尋找 控制項的行事曆部分的設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarFont%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarTitleBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarTitleForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarTrailingForeColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarMonthBackground%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To use a spin button control (also known as an up-down control) to adjust the date/time value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整日期/時間值中使用微調按鈕控制項 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項），設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The calendar will not drop down when the control is selected.
trans-unit.target: 選取控制項時，則日曆不將下拉式清單。

trans-unit.source: The date and time can be adjusted by selecting each element individually and using the up and down buttons to change the value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整日期和時間，個別選取每個項目，然後使用向上和向下鍵按鈕，變更值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A> property contains the current date and time the control is set to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A>屬性包含目前的日期和時間控制項設定。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Text%2A> property or the appropriate member of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A> to get the date and time value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Text%2A>屬性或的適當成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A>取得日期和時間值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Set and Return Dates with the Windows Forms DateTimePicker Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-and-return-dates-with-the-windows-forms-datetimepicker-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 設定和傳回日期搭配 Windows Form DateTimePicker 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-and-return-dates-with-the-windows-forms-datetimepicker-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can limit the dates and times that can be selected by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MinDate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MaxDate%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以限制日期和時間可以藉由設定選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MinDate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MaxDate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The values can be displayed in four formats, which are set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A> property: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Long>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Short>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Time>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Custom>.
trans-unit.target: 值可以顯示四種格式，這是由在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A>屬性： <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Long>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Short>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Time>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Custom>。

trans-unit.source: The default date <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Long?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 預設日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Long?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> to appear as a control for picking or editing times instead of dates, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A> property to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Time>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>顯示為挑選，或編輯而不是日期時間的控制項，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A>屬性`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Time>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Display Time with the DateTimePicker Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-time-with-the-datetimepicker-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用 DateTimePicker 控制項顯示時間](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-time-with-the-datetimepicker-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Custom?displayProperty=nameWithType>, you can create your own format style by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A> property and building a custom format string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Custom?displayProperty=nameWithType>，您可以建立您自己的格式樣式，藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A>屬性及建立自訂格式字串。

trans-unit.source: The custom format string can be a combination of custom field characters and other literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 自訂格式字串可以是自訂欄位的字元和其他常值字元的組合。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display the date as "June 01, 2012 - Friday" by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A> property to "MMMM dd, yyyy - dddd".
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可以藉由設定顯示為 「 年 6 月 01，2012年-星期五 」 的日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A>"MMMM dd，yyyy-dddd"的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Display a Date in a Custom Format with the Windows Forms DateTimePicker Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/display-a-date-in-a-custom-format-with-wf-datetimepicker-control.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用 Windows Form DateTimePicker 控制項的自訂格式來顯示日期](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/display-a-date-in-a-custom-format-with-wf-datetimepicker-control.md)和[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> is data-bound and the backing value is changed to `null`, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> will not be updated and the previous value will be retained.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>是資料繫結和備份值變更為`null`，值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>將不會更新，並將保留先前的值。

trans-unit.source: In situations where this behavior is not desirable (for example, when using a set of data-bound controls to page through a recordset) use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> to a value recognizable as a `null`.
trans-unit.target: 在其中此行為不需要這樣做 （例如，當使用一組資料繫結控制項分頁的資料錄集） 的情況下使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>類別來設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>值辨識為`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control and initializes it.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立新的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制，並將它初始化。

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowCheckBox%2A> property is set so that the control displays a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A> property is set so that the control is displayed as a spin button control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性設定，讓控制項顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A>屬性設定，讓控制項顯示為微調按鈕控制項。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form and call the `CreateMyDateTimePicker` method in the example form’s constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handling method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`CreateMyDateTimePicker`範例表單的建構函式中的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control and initializes it.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立新的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制，並將它初始化。

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowCheckBox%2A> property is set so that the control displays a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A> property is set so that the control is displayed as a spin button control (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性設定，讓控制項顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A>屬性設定，讓控制項顯示為微調按鈕控制項 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> 控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The background <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> 的背景 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.BackColor%2A> has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.BackColor%2A>沒有任何作用的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>。

trans-unit.source: To set the background color for the drop-down calendar of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarMonthBackground%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的背景色彩的下拉式行事曆<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarMonthBackground%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.BackColor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.BackColor" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: The background image for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: This property/method/event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性/方法/事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.BackgroundImage" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.BackgroundImage" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the layout of the background image of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> 控制項之背景影像的配置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>屬性沒有任何作用的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.BackgroundImageLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.BackgroundImageLayout" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font style applied to the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用至月曆的字型樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> that represents the font style applied to the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，表示套用至月曆的字型樣式。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 從開始使用 Windows Vista，並根據佈景主題，設定這個屬性可能不會變更行事曆外觀。

trans-unit.source: For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您可以設定 Windows 使用 Aero 的佈景主題，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為在執行階段衍生自目前作業系統的佈景主題的外觀呈現行事曆的更新的版本。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用這個屬性並啟用行事曆的舊版，您可以停用您的應用程式視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application.
trans-unit.target: 停用視覺化樣式，可能會影響的外觀和行為的應用程式中其他控制項。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用在 Visual Basic 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 專案設計工具並取消核取**啟用 XP 視覺化樣式**核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用 C# 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 Program.cs 並標記為註解`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarFont%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarFont%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control, adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, and then initializes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarFont%2A> property to a dynamically defined <xref:System.Drawing.Font>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制項，將它加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，並再初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarFont%2A>屬性，以動態定義<xref:System.Drawing.Font>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定月曆的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the foreground color of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示月曆的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> is created, this property is initially set equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>已建立，這個屬性一開始設為等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 從開始使用 Windows Vista，並根據佈景主題，設定這個屬性可能不會變更行事曆外觀。

trans-unit.source: For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您可以設定 Windows 使用 Aero 的佈景主題，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為在執行階段衍生自目前作業系統的佈景主題的外觀呈現行事曆的更新的版本。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用這個屬性並啟用行事曆的舊版，您可以停用您的應用程式視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application.
trans-unit.target: 停用視覺化樣式，可能會影響的外觀和行為的應用程式中其他控制項。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用在 Visual Basic 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 專案設計工具並取消核取**啟用 XP 視覺化樣式**核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用 C# 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 Program.cs 並標記為註解`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarForeColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarForeColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>, adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection, and then initializes its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarForeColor%2A> property to the <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Aqua%2A> constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>，將它加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>集合，然後初始化其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CalendarForeColor%2A>屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Aqua%2A>常數。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 指派值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the calendar month.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定月曆月份的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the calendar month.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示月曆月份的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> is created, this property is initially set equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.DefaultMonthBackColor> field value.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>已建立，這個屬性一開始設為等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.DefaultMonthBackColor>欄位值。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 從開始使用 Windows Vista，並根據佈景主題，設定這個屬性可能不會變更行事曆外觀。

trans-unit.source: For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您可以設定 Windows 使用 Aero 的佈景主題，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為在執行階段衍生自目前作業系統的佈景主題的外觀呈現行事曆的更新的版本。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用這個屬性並啟用行事曆的舊版，您可以停用您的應用程式視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application.
trans-unit.target: 停用視覺化樣式，可能會影響的外觀和行為的應用程式中其他控制項。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用在 Visual Basic 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 專案設計工具並取消核取**啟用 XP 視覺化樣式**核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用 C# 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 Program.cs 並標記為註解`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the foreground color of the calendar trailing dates.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示月曆尾隨日期的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> is created, this property is initially set equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.DefaultTrailingForeColor> field value.

trans-unit.source: The trailing dates are the ending dates from the previous month or the beginning dates from the next month used to fill the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 尾隨日期是從上個月的結束日期或下個月用來填滿日曆的開始日期。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value" /> property has been set with a valid date/time value and the displayed value is able to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value" />屬性是否已經使用有效的日期/時間值設定，而且顯示的值能夠更新。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value" /> property has been set with a valid <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value and the displayed value is able to be updated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value" /> 屬性已經使用有效的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 值設定，而且顯示的值能夠更新，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to obtain the state of the check box that is displayed if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowCheckBox%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來取得狀態的核取方塊時，系統會顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Checked%2A> property value is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control displays the properly formatted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A> property value; otherwise, the control displays the last valid date/time value assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A> property or the current date and time (<xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) if no value has ever been assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Checked%2A>屬性值是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制項會顯示適當格式化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A>屬性值; 否則控制項就會顯示最後一個有效的日期/時間值指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A>屬性或目前的日期和時間 (<xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 如果已經被不指派任何值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the drop-down calendar is dismissed and disappears.
trans-unit.target: 發生於下拉式月曆關閉並消失時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CloseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CloseUp>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> named `DateTimePicker1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>名為`DateTimePicker1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CloseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CloseUp>事件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> 控制項建立新的協助工具物件。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.DateTimePickerAccessibleObject" /> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.DateTimePickerAccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有明確呼叫 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> 方法，將會在參考 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> 屬性時呼叫該方法。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>屬性，您必須加入參考`Accessibility`安裝.NET framework 組件。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CreateAccessibilityInstance" /> in a derived class, you should not call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CreateAccessibilityInstance" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CreateAccessibilityInstance" />在衍生類別中，您不應該呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CreateAccessibilityInstance" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates the physical window handle.
trans-unit.target: 建立實體視窗控制代碼 (Window Handle)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含建立控制項之控制代碼時所需的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom date/time format string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自訂的日期時間格式字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the custom date/time format.
trans-unit.target: 表示自訂日期時間格式的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: To display string literals that contain date and time separators or to format strings, you must use escape characters in the substring.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示包含日期和時間分隔符號的字串常值或字串的格式，您必須使用子字串中的逸出字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, to display the date as "June 15 at 12:00 PM", set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A> property to "MMMM dd 'at' t:mm tt".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要顯示為"年 6 月 15 下午 12:00"的日期，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A>"MMMM dd 'at' t:mm tt"的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the "at" substring is not enclosed by escape characters, the result is "June 15 aP 12:00PM" because the "t" character is read as the one-letter A.M./P.M.
trans-unit.target: 如果逸出字元不以"at"子字串，則結果是 「 年 6 月 15 aP 12:00 PM"因為當做單一字母 a.m./p.m.讀取"t"字元。

trans-unit.source: format string (see the format string table below).
trans-unit.target: 格式字串 （請參閱以下的格式字串資料表）。

trans-unit.source: The format strings can be combined to format the date and time.
trans-unit.target: 格式字串可以結合以格式化的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: For example, to display the date and time as 06/15/2001 12:00 PM, this property should be set to "MM'/'dd'/'yyyy hh':'mm tt".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要顯示的日期和時間為 06/15/2001年 12:00 PM，這個屬性應該設定為 「 MM '/' dd '/' yyyy hh': ' mm tt"。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Custom?displayProperty=nameWithType> for this property to affect the formatting of the displayed date and time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A>屬性必須設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Custom?displayProperty=nameWithType>為此屬性會影響顯示的日期和時間格式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists all the valid format strings and their descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出所有有效的格式字串和其說明。

trans-unit.source: Format string
trans-unit.target: 格式化字串

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: d
trans-unit.target: d

trans-unit.source: The one- or two-digit day.
trans-unit.target: 一個或兩位數的日期。

trans-unit.source: dd
trans-unit.target: dd

trans-unit.source: The two-digit day.
trans-unit.target: 兩位數的日期。

trans-unit.source: Single-digit day values are preceded by a 0.
trans-unit.target: 單一位數的日期值前面都為 0。

trans-unit.source: ddd
trans-unit.target: ddd

trans-unit.source: The three-character day-of-week abbreviation.
trans-unit.target: 三個字元的週中日縮寫。

trans-unit.source: dddd
trans-unit.target: dddd

trans-unit.source: The full day-of-week name.
trans-unit.target: 完整的星期名稱。

trans-unit.source: h
trans-unit.target: h

trans-unit.source: The one- or two-digit hour in 12-hour format.
trans-unit.target: 一個或兩個位數的小時，12 小時制的小時。

trans-unit.source: hh
trans-unit.target: hh

trans-unit.source: The two-digit hour in 12-hour format.
trans-unit.target: 兩位數的小時，12 小時制的小時。

trans-unit.source: Single digit values are preceded by a 0.
trans-unit.target: 0 個前面有單一數字值。

trans-unit.source: H
trans-unit.target: H

trans-unit.source: The one- or two-digit hour in 24-hour format.
trans-unit.target: 一個或兩個位數的小時，24 小時制的小時。

trans-unit.source: HH
trans-unit.target: HH

trans-unit.source: The two-digit hour in 24-hour format.
trans-unit.target: 兩位數的小時，24 小時制的小時。

trans-unit.source: Single digit values are preceded by a 0.
trans-unit.target: 0 個前面有單一數字值。

trans-unit.source: m
trans-unit.target: m

trans-unit.source: The one- or two-digit minute.
trans-unit.target: 一個或兩位數分鐘。

trans-unit.source: mm
trans-unit.target: mm

trans-unit.source: The two-digit minute.
trans-unit.target: 兩位數分鐘。

trans-unit.source: Single digit values are preceded by a 0.
trans-unit.target: 0 個前面有單一數字值。

trans-unit.source: M
trans-unit.target: M

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format of the date and time displayed in the control.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat" /> values.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the date/time format the date is displayed in.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性決定中顯示的日期的日期/時間格式。

trans-unit.source: The date/time format is based on the user's regional settings in their operating system.
trans-unit.target: 日期/時間格式取決於作業系統中的使用者的地區設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Custom?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A> property to affect the formatting of the displayed date and time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A>屬性必須設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Custom?displayProperty=nameWithType>如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A>屬性會影響顯示的日期和時間格式。

trans-unit.source: To display only time in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Time>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示中的唯一時間<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Time>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.FormatChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.FormatChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> named `DateTimePicker1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>名為`DateTimePicker1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.FormatChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.FormatChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的按鍵是標準輸入按鍵或需要前置處理的特殊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的按鍵是標準輸入按鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Call this method during window-message preprocessing to determine whether the specified key is a regular input key that should be sent directly to the control or a special key (such as PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN) that should preprocessed.
trans-unit.target: 視窗訊息來判斷指定的按鍵是標準輸入的按鍵，應直接傳送至控制項或應該前置處理過的特殊按鍵 （例如 PAGE UP 和 PAGE DOWN） 前置處理期間呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, send the key to the control only if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: 在後者的情況下，只有在前置處理階段沒有使用，來控制傳送索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum date and time that can be selected in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項中可以選取的最大日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The maximum date and time that can be selected in the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項中可以選取的最大日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The default is determined as the minimum of the CurrentCulture’s Calendar’s <see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime" /> property and December 31st 9998 12 am.
trans-unit.target: 預設值將判定為 CurrentCulture 之 Calendar 的 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime" /> 屬性的最小值以及 9998 年 12 月 31 日上午 12 點。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制，並將它初始化。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowCheckBox%2A> property is set so that the control displays a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A> property is set so that the control is displayed as a spin button control (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性設定，讓控制項顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A>屬性設定，讓控制項顯示為微調按鈕控制項 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項）。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is less than the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MinDate" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值小於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MinDate" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is greater than the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MaxDateTime" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值大於 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MaxDateTime" /> 值。

trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> 控制項的最大日期值。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The maximum date is set to 12/31/9998 23:59:59.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.RightToLeftLayout%2A> property is used for international applications where the language is written from right to left, such as Hebrew or Arabic.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> named `DateTimePicker1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>名為`DateTimePicker1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a check box is displayed to the left of the selected date.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出核取方塊是否顯示在選取的日期左邊。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a check box is displayed to the left of the selected date; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果核取方塊顯示在選取的日期左邊，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowCheckBox%2A> property is set to `true`, a check box is displayed to the left of the date in the control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性設定為`true`，核取方塊就會顯示在控制項中日期的左方。

trans-unit.source: When the check box is selected, the date/time value can be updated.
trans-unit.target: 選取此核取方塊時，可以更新的日期/時間值。

trans-unit.source: When the check box is cleared, the date/time value is unable to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 清除核取方塊，日期/時間值時，無法變更。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control and initializes it.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立新的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制，並將它初始化。

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowCheckBox%2A> property is set so that the control displays a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A> property is set so that the control is displayed as a spin button control (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性設定，讓控制項顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A>屬性設定，讓控制項顯示為微調按鈕控制項 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a spin button control (also known as an up-down control) is used to adjust the date/time value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否使用微調按鈕控制項 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 來調整日期/時間值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a spin button control is used to adjust the date/time value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用微調按鈕控制項來調整日期/時間值則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A> property is set to `true`, a spin button control (also known as an up-down control), rather than a drop-down calendar, is used to adjust time values.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A>屬性設定為`true`、 微調按鈕控制項 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項），而不是下拉式行事曆，來調整時間值。

trans-unit.source: The date and time can be adjusted by selecting each element individually and using the up and down buttons to change the value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整日期和時間，個別選取每個項目，然後使用向上和向下鍵按鈕，變更值。

trans-unit.source: To display only time in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Time>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示中的唯一時間<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat.Time>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control and initializes it.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立新的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制，並將它初始化。

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowCheckBox%2A> property is set so that the control displays a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A> property is set so that the control is displayed as a spin button control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性設定，讓控制項顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ShowUpDown%2A>屬性設定，讓控制項顯示為微調按鈕控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個控制項的相關文字。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示和這個控制項相關的文字。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by this property is equivalent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A> property with the appropriate formatting or custom formatting applied.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性所傳回的字串相當於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A>屬性與適當的格式設定或套用自訂格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A> property is set to 06/01/2001 12:00:00 AM while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A> property is set to "dddd, MMMM dd, yyyy", the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Text%2A> property value is "Friday, June 01, 2001".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A>屬性設定為 06/01/2001年 12:00:00 時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.CustomFormat%2A>屬性設定為"dddd，MMMM dd，yyyy"<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Text%2A>屬性值為"Friday，年 6 月 01，2001 」。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the string must be convertible to an instance of the <xref:System.DateTime> class.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性時，字串必須可轉換為的執行個體<xref:System.DateTime>類別。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to define a custom format that results in a string that cannot be converted to a valid <xref:System.DateTime> value.
trans-unit.target: 您可透過定義自訂格式，導致無法轉換成有效的字串<xref:System.DateTime>值。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the string returned from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Text%2A> property might cause an error if it is passed back to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，傳回從字串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Text%2A>屬性可能會導致錯誤，如果傳遞回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Text%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the string cannot be converted to a date/time value, the <xref:System.DateTime> class throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果字串無法轉換成日期/時間值，<xref:System.DateTime>類別會擲回<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Text" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Text" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> 控制項的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表目前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" />。

trans-unit.source: The string includes the type and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value" /> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串包括了控制項的類型與 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date/time value assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指派給控制項的日期時間值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value assign to the control.
trans-unit.target: 指派給控制項的 值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A> property has not been changed in code or by the user, it is set to the current date and time (<xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A>屬性未變更程式碼或使用者，則會設定為目前的日期和時間 (<xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A> property to retrieve the current date value.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A>屬性，以擷取目前的日期值。

trans-unit.source: First, the example displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 首先，此範例會顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example then increments the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A> property by one day and displays the property value again.
trans-unit.target: 接著，此範例為增量單位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value%2A>屬性，方法是一天，並顯示屬性值，一次。

trans-unit.source: The set value is less than <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MinDate" /> or more than <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MaxDate" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值小於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MinDate" /> 或大於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MaxDate" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Value" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: User input is validated before this event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 驗證使用者輸入之前會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when the entered date is earlier than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MinDateTime> or later than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MaxDateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的日期早於時，不會引發這個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MinDateTime>或更晚<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.MaxDateTime>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ValueChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ValueChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> named `DateTimePicker1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>名為`DateTimePicker1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ValueChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.ValueChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 處理 Windows 訊息。
